Uses of Class
sheep.math.Vector2

Packages that use Vector2
sheep.collision Contains classes for collision detection, spatial partitioning and interfaces for collision events. 
sheep.game Contains classes related to game logic. 
sheep.gui Contains the graphical user interface system. 
sheep.input Contains the input singletons and interfaces for listening to events generated by these singletons. 
sheep.math Contains a 2D vector class and a bounding box class.
